Home.Title: Create Powerful Marketing Content with Artificial Intelligence
Home.Subtitle: AIketing empowers you to generate impactful texts and visuals for your campaigns, even without marketing or design experience.

Time.Title: Time Savings
Time.Description: Let the AI do the heavy lifting of copywriting and focus on your strategy.

Quality.Title: Quality Content
Quality.Description: Generate optimized texts and visuals that engage your target audience.

Autonomy.Title: Total Autonomy
Autonomy.Description: Control your own marketing without relying on expensive agencies.

HowItWorks.Title: Start Creating in Seconds
HowItWorks.Subtitle: A simple process for powerful results.

Step1.Title: Enter Your Idea
Step1.Description: Tell the AI what you need: the topic, style, and goal of your content.

Step2.Title: Generate with One Click
Step2.Description: Our AI analyzes your request and instantly creates optimized texts and visuals.

Step3.Title: Use and Optimize
Step3.Description: Copy your new content, publish it on your platforms, and watch your engagement grow.

Pricing.Title: Flexible plans for all levels
Pricing.Subtitle: Start for free and grow as you need.

Cta.Title: Ready to boost your marketing?
Cta.Subtitle: Join creators and businesses who are turning their ideas into impactful content.

DashboardPage.Title: Your Dashboard
DashboardPage.Subtitle: Here is a summary of your {plan} plan and your current usage.

TextGeneratorPage.Title: Intelligent Content Generator
TextGeneratorPage.Subtitle: Choose a format, describe your idea, and let the AI do the rest.
TextGeneratorPage.ContentTypeLabel: What type of content do you want to create?
TextGeneratorPage.TopicPlaceholder: e.g., The launch of a new coffee-scented perfume with a provocative edge.
TextGeneratorPage.GenericError: Could not generate content. Try refining your topic.
TextGeneratorPage.NetworkError: Connection error with the AI service.

ImageGeneratorPage.Title: AI Thumbnail Generator
ImageGeneratorPage.Subtitle: Create impactful visuals for your videos and posts in seconds.
ImageGeneratorPage.PromptLabel: Describe the image you want to create
ImageGeneratorPage.PromptPlaceholder: e.g., An astronaut relaxing on a beach on Mars, digital art style.
ImageGeneratorPage.Loading: Generating image... This may take a moment.
ImageGeneratorPage.GenericError: Could not generate the image. Please try again.
ImageGeneratorPage.NetworkError: Connection error with the AI service.
ImageGeneratorPage.NoImageReturned: The AI processed your request but didn't return an image. Try a different prompt.

IdentityErrors.PasswordTooShort: Passwords must be at least 8 characters.
IdentityErrors.PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: Passwords must have at least one non-alphanumeric character.
IdentityErrors.PasswordRequiresLower: Passwords must have at least one lowercase ('a'-'z').
IdentityErrors.PasswordRequiresUpper: Passwords must have at least one uppercase ('A'-'Z').
IdentityErrors.PasswordRequiresDigit: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0'-'9').
